smile.taxonomy

Class Concept

  • java.lang.Object
    • smile.taxonomy.Concept

  • public class Concept
extends java.lang.Object
    Concept is a set of synonyms, i.e. group of words that are roughly synonymous in a given context.
    Author:
    Haifeng Li
